definition: Services that clean, wash, dry, or press clothing and textiles for customers

positive_examples: I need to drop off my suit at the dry cleaner before the wedding
The hotel offers laundry service for guest clothing
She runs a small business ironing shirts for busy professionals
The dry cleaning service removed the wine stain from my dress
We use a wash-and-fold service to handle our weekly laundry
The tailor shop also provides pressing services for formal wear
negative_examples: The house cleaning service vacuumed all the carpets
Professional window washers cleaned the office building
The janitor mopped the floors in the hallway
Car wash services include interior detailing
The maid service dusted all the furniture
Pool cleaning companies maintain residential swimming pools
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: RepairService, TransportationService, ConsultingService, MaintenanceService, DeliveryService
